definition: Li Lianjie or Jet Li (1963-), martial arts sportsman, subsequently film star and director
plum
surname Li
surname Lian
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
variant of 傑|杰[jie2]

sentences.english: Jet Li has decided to quit acting for a year to focus on disaster relief and reconstruction of quake-hit areas.
sentences.chinese: 李連杰決定息影一年，專注賑災及災區重建工作。

sentences.english: The end of the year, Jet Li's heart is still hanging.
sentences.chinese: 進入歲末，李連杰的心仍懸着。

sentences.english: Li himself escorted the first shipment of supplies two days later.
sentences.chinese: 在兩天後，李連杰自己護送了一批救援物資。

sentences.english: In 1982, wushu champion Jet Li appeared in the film Shaolin Temple.
sentences.chinese: 1982年，武術冠軍李連杰主演了電影《少林寺》。

sentences.english: Jet Li is (the most popular) actor in China.
sentences.chinese: 李連杰是中國最受歡迎的男演員。

sentences.english: And this one quarter, they invited a class meetings jet li uncle.
sentences.chinese: 而這一節班會課，他們請來了李連杰叔叔。

sentences.english: Jet Li needs these entrepreneurs as much as Clinton needs Murdoch.
sentences.chinese: 李連杰就像克乳頓需黑默多克澤樣需黑這些回業家們。

sentences.english: In this film Li Lianjie played the part of a Shaolin monk.
sentences.chinese: 在這部電影中李連杰扮演一個少林和尚。

sentences.english: First of all, Jet Li needs them to provide start-up capital for him.
sentences.chinese: 首守，李連杰需黑他們爲他提快啓原資金。

sentences.english: Jet Li is Nameless in Hero.
sentences.chinese: 在《英雄》中李連杰無名寂寂。

sentences.english: The men who sat next to us are good at Kongfu, they have studied in the same Kongfu school with Jet Lee.
sentences.chinese: 旁邊坐着的是我們中國功夫的傳人，李連杰的師弟們。

sentences.english: Today is martial arts legend Jet Li.
sentences.chinese: 今天，是武術傳奇，李連杰。

sentences.english: If you watch this movie, you will know who Jet Li is.
sentences.chinese: 如果你看了《龍之吻》，你就會知道李連杰是誰。

sentences.english: Li has warned that Fearless might be his last martial arts movie.
sentences.chinese: 李連杰說《霍元甲》可能是他最後一部功夫電影。

sentences.english: Both Jacky Chan and Jet Li don't like to use stuntman in their films.
sentences.chinese: 成龍和李連杰在電影中都不愛用替身演員。
